rooms.name: Front Office
rooms.description: The hotel front desk is the main hub for guest services, where check-ins, reservations, and inquiries are handled. It offers assistance and information, ensuring a smooth and welcoming experience for guests.

rooms.name: Elevator
rooms.description: Elevators for easy access to all floors.

rooms.name: Function Room
rooms.description: A spacious room for events and meetings.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.description: Enjoy a calm and rewarding plunge in our swimming pool. With a spacious size of 130 sqm, everyone can jump in and enjoy sunny days at The Exchange Regency Residence Hotel.

rooms.name: Jacuzzi
rooms.description: A hot tub for a soothing experience.

rooms.name: Fitness Center
rooms.description: Stay in shape at our fitness center. Complete with a well-curated selection of equipment and regularly sanitized for your safety.

rooms.name: Game Room
rooms.description: A room with various games for entertainment.

rooms.name: Mini Golf
rooms.description: A mini golf course for leisure activities.

rooms.name: Children's Playground
rooms.description: A safe and fun area for children to play.

rooms.name: Deluxe Classic
rooms.description: Simple yet sensible, the Deluxe Classic is an ideal choice for the prudent. With ample space and the standard features, guests can enjoy convenient accommodation and hospitable service at a reasonable cost. With the option of queen or twin beds, it is perfect for individual traveller or those with a companion.

rooms.name: Deluxe Premium
rooms.description: An upgrade from the Classic, the Deluxe Premium brings you the same basic comforts with additional amenities while you’re on a brief business trip or an extended staycation.

rooms.name: Premier
rooms.description: Find all the essentials plus a little extra in our Premier Rooms. It comes with additional bathroom amenities and optional kitchenware, perfect for those who are looking for extended business or leisure stays.

rooms.name: Suite
rooms.description: Not a fan of traveling solo? Bring your family or friends along and stay in any of our suites. Best for larger groups, each suite has 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a fully-equipped kitchen, dining area, and receiving area.
roomFeatures: Kitchenette with electric stove and rangehood
